title: 02/19/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 02/19/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why Carson Wentz is the one who “won the trade” between the Colts and the Eagles not the teams. He also questions why the Bears and Washington aren’t taking a chance on trading for a young quarterback to try and win a Super Bowl this season. Plus, he talks to 3-time Super Bowl Champion Eric Mangini to find out what the Patriots have planned for next season as they continue to try rebuilding after Tom Brady’s departure. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
